issue.title: [C++] Implement case insenstive match in match_substring(_regex) and match_like
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12835](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12835). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See discussion in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10356> - we can add a (default-case-sensitive) flag for case insensitive matching for these kernels. Any kernel which doesn't implement the option should raise an error if set.
